attributes.action: Save the NHS - Stop the underfunding and skill shortages
attributes.additional_details: We demand HM Government implements the following 5 steps to save the NHS. a) Add all NHS job roles to the Shortage Occupation list to ensure full staffing. b) Cease all future outsourcing of core functionality to 3rd parties. c) Increase the pitiful recent settlement to the full £350m per week promised in the referendum. d) If increase funding is not readily available stop brexit and spend that wasted money on the NHS instead. e) Introduce Legislation to exclude any foreign government or companies involvement in the NHS, especially as part of any post Brexit trade deal.
attributes.background: We the undersigned believe current Government policy is creating a crisis in the NHS, which is the countries most valued institution.
